DOC.brief_summary: This study compare clinical outcome Precizon toric intraocular lens ( IOL ) Tecnis toric IOL .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Clinical Outcomes Toric Intraocular Lens
DOC.detailed_description: In cataract surgery , phacoemulsification , intraocular lens implant patient 's well visual acuity . When patient large amount corneal astigmatism , toric intraocular lens recommend correct preexist astigmatism .
DOC.criteria: Patient cataract regular corneal astigmatism ( 0.50 diopter 2.50 diopter consider anterior posterior corneal surface ) Amblyopia , irregular astigmatism , corneal opacity , glaucoma , retinal disease , history ocular inflammation , previous intraocular surgery
